attributes.action: Make buses free for students, under 16's, over 60's, and those made redundant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to urge the Prime Minister to introduce a law which forces all bus companies (i.e Arriva, Stagecoach, Selkent) to make their service free to all under 16's and students, cheaper for under 18's that are not in full time education, our OAP's and those who have been made redundant. This will lead to more people taking buses all over your country, thus less cars on the road, and greener country.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make buses free for students, under 16's, over 60's, and those made redundant."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22239


Prime Minister's Office
